name: The devil sky
description:
Royal Fantasy RPG

On the island of Vyvresto, there is the Magic Sky Kingdom and the Holy Heaven Kingdom.

Nawoki, a young man, was spending his time at the Magic Sky Council's Fifth Training School.

Nawoki lives in the Demon Sky Country.

It seems that the Holy Heaven is acting suspiciously...

Nawoki gets caught up in the war between the Demon Sky Country and the Holy Heaven Country...

[Introduction

The island of Vyvrest is made up of two countries, the Demon Sky Kingdom and the Holy Heaven Kingdom. As the relationship between the two countries grows darker, Nawoki is tossed about by fate and meets a girl. This is a fantasy RPG that can be called the royal road. The battle balance is a bit peaky, so running away and saving frequently are a must. I recommend it to those who want to enjoy a quick, orthodox, yet epic adventure.

(*The above introduction is taken from Salt's note (https://note.com/salt40/n/nb69a864c936e))

Estimated playing time: 50 minutes

The 1st Free Game Contest for Newcomers

Jan. 8, 2021 Over 100 downloads

March 30, 2021: Over 150 downloads

Live games and game introductions are welcome.

You don't have to contact us, but we'd appreciate it if you did.

I'll be there to watch.

I'd love to hear your feedback on this game.

You don't have to contact me, but if you do

I'll be happy to check it out.

https://twitter.com/10Tah5

王道ファンタジー？ＲＰＧ

ビヴレスト島には魔空国と聖天国がある

青年ナヲキは魔空協議会第五養成所で過ごしていた。

ナヲキは魔空国に住んでいる

どうやら聖天国が怪しい動きをしているようだ…

ナヲキは魔空国と聖天国の戦に巻き込まれていく…

【紹介】

魔空国と聖天国、2つの国からなるビヴレスト島。主人公ナヲキは魔空国の養成所で訓練に励む軍人の卵。2国の関係に暗雲が立ち込める中、ナヲキは運命に翻弄され、1人の少女と出会う。王道中の王道と言ってよいファンタジーRPGです。戦闘バランスはややピーキーなので、逃走やこまめなセーブが必須でしょう。オーソドックスでありながら壮大な冒険をサクッと楽しみたい方におススメです。

（※上記の紹介文はソルトさんのnote（https://note.com/salt40/n/nb69a864c936e）より引用）

想定プレイ時間 ５０分

第1回新人フリーゲームコンテスト 出品作品

2021年1月8日 100をDL突破

2021年3月30日 150をDL突破
